alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 6:03AM AKST until March 11 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occuring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches, are occuring. * WHERE...Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country. * WHEN...Until 6 PM Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for significant reductions in visibility at times. Heaviest snow south of Chicken and along the Alaska Highway. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
